name: Pixieshot Gallery – Widgets for Elementor
author: kraftplugins

sections.description:
Pixieshot Gallery plugin is a feature-rich gallery plugin for creating beautiful and mobile-responsive galleries within a couple of minutes. The plugin includes 4 Elementor widgets for creating galleries.

Masonry Gallery
Justified Gallery
Grid Gallery
Filterable Gallery

This plugin is ideal for photographers, artists, studios and others who are looking to add attractive galleries to their website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload advanced-gallery.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.3 – 15 April 2024

  • Compatibility Update for WordPress 6.5

1.0.3 – 31 May 2023

  • Compatibility Update for WordPress 6.2

1.0.2 – 16 May 2022

  • Fixed Fancybox pagination issue

1.0.1 – 15 May 2022

  • Added jQuery dependency to gallery JS.
  • Minor Bug Fixes.

1.0.0 – 10 May 2022

  • Initial Release.
